Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Jan Hasik
Reviews.Content: This is a great kit for everyone! Five of my friends already purchased this camera since I recommended it. Everyone is very satisfied!

ProductInfo.Features:
F1.4-2.3 Leica DC vario SUMMILUX 24mm Wide Angle
10MP new high sensitivity MOS sensor
7.5x Intelligent zoom, less ghost with Nano Surface Coating Lens
60p Full HD Video Recording with Stereo Microphone in AVCHD Progressive /MP4,
9fps High Speed Continuous Shooting
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-LX7 DMCLX7 DMC LX7 Digital Camera (Black) + Flexpod + Case + 16GB Kit
